title: Sequoia & Kings Canyon National Parks: Fire and Your Visit
body: Fire and Your Visit       With an active fire and fuels management program, Sequoia & Kings Canyon National Parks are one of the premiere places to observe natural fire and prescribed burns in action.  Fire Restrictions As of 8:00 a.m. on June 28, 2016, the parks will be in Stage 2 fire restrictions.   The Current Fire Restrictions page provides info for the parks on where fires and smoking are prohibited.   Wildness users please refer to the Minimum Impact Restrictions.    Current Fire News  The Current Fire Information page has info about current fires in the parks. (Note: There will be no listings if there are no active fires in the parks.)   Additional Information You can visit our Main Fire Page to learn more about fire's role in the Sierra Nevada.    Note: Visitors to the parks should be prepared to see fire and smoke at any time.
